summary: REQ-15 appears implemented by updating the footer to a static “© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad” while preserving social links. A deployment guide was added, but it is located under frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md and the provided diff content is truncated mid-section, so repo-level placement and completeness vs REQ-16 cannot be fully confirmed from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a repo-level publishing/deployment guide (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md) documenting steps to build and deploy to the Internet Computer.
missing_requirements.reason: A deployment guide was added, but it is under frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md rather than at the repository root, and the shown content ends abruptly after “Your application will be accessible at:”, so it’s unclear from the diff whether the guide is complete and repo-level as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added repository state/summary metadata files not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a footer text change and a deployment guide; it does not request updating project_state.json or adding/modifying a frontend file summary index.
